channel.title: Get-Starteds on Cherry Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Get-Starteds on Cherry Studio

item.title: Initialize workspace
Initialize workspace
item.description: Workspace # Workspace is a folder in your machine disk that containing cherry studio record files, media files, … We only have one workspace used at a time. Initialize # Init workspace from empty folder Go to dashboard and click Init workspace . Then choose empty folder Init workspace from existing workspace folder Go to dashboard and click Init workspace . Then choose a folder having init.csow file inside.

item.title: Intoduction
item.description: Introduction # Cherry studio tool # Cherry studio is a powerful tool to create media content that make things easier, more effective, focus on coding tutorial helpers. See [demo] See sample result How it works # Right after you grant Cherry Studio to access a disk folder in your computer, we can store workspace data there including files/folder related to your recording material thanks to modern javascript FileSystemAPI. We only have access to workspace folder, we CAN’T access outside of it.
